sn36.17:1.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn36.17:1.2: “katamā nu kho, bhante, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.17:1.3: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.17:1.5: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.17:1.9: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn36.17:1.11: Yaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vedanāya assādo.
sn36.17:1.12: Yaṃ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn36.17:1.13: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ.
sn36.17:2.1: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.17:2.2: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti …pe…
sn36.17:2.3: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.17:2.4: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.17:2.5: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti …pe…
sn36.17:2.6: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.17:2.8: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.17:2.9: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:2.10: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa pīti paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.17:2.11: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:2.12: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:2.13: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
